attributes.action: Abolish inheritance tax or raise  threshold to one million per person
attributes.background: Average working individual that has Saved and work Hard always paying average 20 o/o I  find unfair to be taxed again

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like the threshold for inheritance tax to be raised to £1million, you could sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168609
